mapper.insert: insert into order_form( order_id, order_number, order_videoName, order_startTime, order_endTime, order_videoType, order_duration, order_userId, order_orderType, order_createTime, order_status, order_qtRemark, order_cost )values( #{id}, #{number}, #{videoName}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{videoType}, #{duration}, #{userId}, #{orderType}, #{createTime}, #{status}, #{qtRemark}, #{cost} )
